Key.Original: Enables external Database persistence for AI Commander
Amount of pre-placed installations like IED factories, HQ (asymmetric mode only)
Requires Military Logistics Module! Selects the threshold of the AI Commanders reinforcement requests (90% / 75% / 50% of original forces)
Override AI Commander drop downs with f.e. ["BLU_F","BLU_G_F"]. Only use factions of one side!
AI Commander will control this faction. Multiselection is possible!

Place a Military AI Commander module in the editor and select a faction from the dropdown. Custom factions can be entered in the “override default faction” box. Choose the Control Type in the drop down menu. By default, the AI Commander will take command of all available virtual units (profiles) for its faction. Therefore, it requires a minimum of one synced Placement Module and the Virtual AI module.
Some soldiers can carry viable information about nearby installations
Option to enable or disable roadblocks as an option for asymmetric commanders
Maximum of objectives engaged at the same time! Reduces speed of progression!
Minimum of ALiVE civilians needed per objective for a recruitment center to be set up (Asymmetric Warfare only)!
